## Description

Class representing a prism-shaped [PrimitiveMesh](PrimitiveMesh.md).

## Property Descriptions

<a id="PrismMesh_property_left_to_right"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **left_to_right** = `0.5` [ðŸ”—](#PrismMesh_property_left_to_right)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_left_to_right**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_left_to_right**\ (\ )

Displacement of the upper edge along the X axis. 0.0 positions edge straight above the bottom-left edge.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="PrismMesh_property_size"></a>

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- [Vector3](Vector3.md) **get_size**\ (\ )

Size of the prism.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="PrismMesh_property_subdivide_depth"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_subdivide_depth**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_subdivide_depth**\ (\ )

Number of added edge loops along the Z axis.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="PrismMesh_property_subdivide_height"></a>

- `void` **set_subdivide_height**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_subdivide_height**\ (\ )

Number of added edge loops along the Y axis.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="PrismMesh_property_subdivide_width"></a>

- [int](int.md) **get_subdivide_width**\ (\ )
